title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in gray ink at upper right: "Ank. 5-Dec. 1935/R..."
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite on bowl: "1 b;" foot: "1 b."
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Round cup drawn in plan and elevation flanked by applied band with scalloped outer edge which continues down to the trapezoidal-shaped base. To the right of the base a small graphite drawing of the cup contour meeting base contour.
Puiforcat collection contains two archival photographs, Box 7, Folder 19, "Cups, 9000 series" # 9134 (one on wood base, one without).
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 9134, Coupe ailettes dentelee.
